title: Study on heat transfer performance of heat exchange surface and flow channel under negative pressure
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript

This paper presents a theoretical analysis and simulation study on the heat transfer characteristics of heat exchange surfaces and flow channels under negative pressure. A theoretical analysis model of the...
